member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.DefinitionID
member.summary: Gets and sets the DefinitionID of the current List

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.EnableSortOrder
member.summary: Property to determine if this list has custom sort order
member.remarks: Up/Down button in datagrid will be visibled based on this property. If disable, list will be sorted anphabetically

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.SelectedListItems
member.summary: Gets the selected collection of List Items

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.SystemList
member.summary: Property to determine if this list is system (DNN core)
member.remarks: Default entries in system list can not be deleted Entries in system list is sorted anphabetically

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.ListName
member.summary: Get or set the ListName for this set of List Entries

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.ListPortalID
member.summary: Gets the portalId for this set of List Entries

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.ParentKey
member.summary: Get or set the ParentKey for this set of List Entries

member.name: P:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.SelectedKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Selected key

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.EnableEdit(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Switching to edit mode, change controls visibility for editing depends on AddList params

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.EnableView(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Switching to view mode, change controls visibility for viewing
member.param: Boolean value to determine View or Edit mode

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.EntriesGridItemCommand(System.Object,Telerik.Web.UI.GridCommandEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles events when clicking image button in the grid (Edit/Up/Down)

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.OnAddEntryClick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: Using "CommandName" property of cmdSaveEntry to determine this is a new entry of an existing list

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.OnSaveEntryClick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: Using "CommandName" property of cmdSaveEntry to determine action to take (ListUpdate/AddEntry/AddList)

member.name: M:Dnn.Modules.Lists.ListEntries.OnDeleteClick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: If deleting entry is not the last one in the list, rebinding the grid, otherwise return back to main page (rebinding DNNTree)
